vrrpNewCfgVirtRtrGrpDelete.description: When set to the value of 2 (delete), the entire row is deleted. When read, other(1) is returned. Setting the value to anything other than delete(2) has no effect on the state of the row.

ospfCumNbrhello.description: The sum total of all Hello packets received from neighbours on all OSPF areas and interfaces.

ospfCumNbrStart.name: ospfCumNbrStart
ospfCumNbrStart.description: The sum total number of neighbours in this state (i.e. an indication that Hello packets should now be sent to the neighbour at intervals of HelloInterval seconds.) across all OSPF areas and interfaces.

ospfCumNbrAdjointOk.name: ospfCumNbrAdjointOk
ospfCumNbrAdjointOk.description: The sum total number of decisions to be made (again) as to whether an adjacency should be established/maintained with the neighbour across all OSPF areas and interfaces.

ospfCumNbrNegotiationDone.name: ospfCumNbrNegotiationDone
ospfCumNbrNegotiationDone.description: The sum total number of neighbours in this state wherein the Master/slave relationship has been negotiated, and sequence numbers have been exchanged, across all OSPF areas and interfaces.

ospfCumNbrExchangeDone.name: ospfCumNbrExchangeDone
ospfCumNbrExchangeDone.description: The sum total number of neighbours in this state (i.e. in an adjacency's final state) having transimitted a full sequence of Database Description packets, across all OSPF areas and interfaces.

ospfCumNbrBadRequests.name: ospfCumNbrBadRequests
ospfCumNbrBadRequests.description: The sum total number of Link State Requests which have been received for a link state advertisement not contained in the database across all interfaces and OSPF areas.

ospfCumNbrBadSequence.name: ospfCumNbrBadSequence
ospfCumNbrBadSequence.description: The sum total number of Database Description packets which have been received that either a) has an unexpected DD sequence number b) Unexpectedly has the init bit set c) Has an options field differing from the last Options field received in a Database Description packet. Any of these conditions indicate that some error has occured during adjacency establishment for all OSPF areas and interfaces.

ospfCumNbrLoadingDone.name: ospfCumNbrLoadingDone
ospfCumNbrLoadingDone.description: The sum total number of link state updates received for all out-of-date portions of the database across all OSPF areas and interfaces.

ospfCumNbrN1way.name: ospfCumNbrN1way
ospfCumNbrN1way.description: The sum total number of Hello packets received from neighbours, in which this router is not mentioned across all OSPF interfaces and areas.

ospfCumNbrRstAd.name: ospfCumNbrRstAd
ospfCumNbrRstAd.description: The sum total number of times the Neighbour adjacency has been reset across all OPSF areas and interfaces.

ospfCumNbrDown.name: ospfCumNbrDown
ospfCumNbrDown.description: The total number of Neighbouring routers down (i.e. in the initial state of a neighbour conversation.) across all OSPF areas and interfaces.

ospfCumIntfHello.name: ospfCumIntfHello
ospfCumIntfHello.description: The sum total number of Hello packets sent on all interfaces and areas

ospfCumIntfDown.name: ospfCumIntfDown
ospfCumIntfDown.description: The sum total number of interfaces down in all OSPF areas.

ospfCumIntfLoop.name: ospfCumIntfLoop
ospfCumIntfLoop.description: The sum total of interfaces no longer connected to the attatched network across all OSPF areas and interfaces.

ospfCumIntfUnloop.name: ospfCumIntfUnloop
ospfCumIntfUnloop.description: The sum total number of interfaces, connected to the attatched network in all OSPF areas.

ospfCumIntfWaitTimer.name: ospfCumIntfWaitTimer
ospfCumIntfWaitTimer.description: The sum total number of times the Wait Timer has been fired, (indicating the end of the waiting period that is required before electing a (Backup) Designated Router) across all OSPF areas and interfaces.

ospfCumIntfBackup.name: ospfCumIntfBackup
ospfCumIntfBackup.description: The sum total number of Backup Designated Routers on the attatched network for all OSPF areas and interfaces.

ospfCumIntfNbrChange.name: ospfCumIntfNbrChange
ospfCumIntfNbrChange.description: The sum total number of changes in the set of bidirectional neighbours associated with any interface across all OSPF areas.

ospfTmrsKckOffHello.name: ospfTmrsKckOffHello
ospfTmrsKckOffHello.description: The sum total number of times the Hello timer has been fired (which triggers the send of a Hello packet) across all OPSF areas and interfaces.

ospfTmrsKckOffRetransmit.name: ospfTmrsKckOffRetransmit
ospfTmrsKckOffRetransmit.description: The sum total number of times the Retransmit timer has been fired across all OPSF areas and interfaces.

ospfTmrsKckOffLsaLock.name: ospfTmrsKckOffLsaLock
ospfTmrsKckOffLsaLock.description: The sum total number of times the Lsa Lock timer has been fired across all OSPF areas and interfaces.

ospfTmrsKckOffLsaAck.name: ospfTmrsKckOffLsaAck
ospfTmrsKckOffLsaAck.description: The sum total number of times the Lsa Ack timer has been fired across all ospf areas and interfaces.

ospfTmrsKckOffDbage.name: ospfTmrsKckOffDbage
ospfTmrsKckOffDbage.description: The total number of times the Dbage has been fired.

ospfTmrsKckOffSummary.name: ospfTmrsKckOffSummary
ospfTmrsKckOffSummary.description: The total number of times the Summary timer has been fired.

ospfTmrsKckOffAseExport.name: ospfTmrsKckOffAseExport
ospfTmrsKckOffAseExport.description: The total number of times the ASE Export timer has been fired.

ospfStartTime.name: ospfStartTime
ospfStartTime.description: The time when ospf has been started.

ospfProcessUptime.name: ospfProcessUptime
ospfProcessUptime.description: The time since ospf has been started.

ospfLsTypesSupported.name: ospfLsTypesSupported
ospfLsTypesSupported.description: The Link State Types that are supported.

ospfIntfCountForRouter.name: ospfIntfCountForRouter
ospfIntfCountForRouter.description: The number of interfaces for this router.

ospfVlinkCountForRouter.name: ospfVlinkCountForRouter
ospfVlinkCountForRouter.description: The number of virtual links for this router.

ospfTotalNeighbours.name: ospfTotalNeighbours
ospfTotalNeighbours.description: The total number of OSPF neighbours.

ospfNbrInInitState.name: ospfNbrInInitState
ospfNbrInInitState.description: The number of neighbours in the initial state of exchange.

ospfNbrInExchState.name: ospfNbrInExchState
ospfNbrInExchState.description: The number of neighbours in the exchange state.

ospfNbrInFullState.name: ospfNbrInFullState
ospfNbrInFullState.description: The number of neighbours in the Full state of exchange.

ospfTotalTransitAreas.name: ospfTotalTransitAreas
ospfTotalTransitAreas.description: The Total number of Transit areas.

ospfTotalNssaAreas.name: ospfTotalNssaAreas
ospfTotalNssaAreas.description: The Total number of NSSA areas.

ospfAreaInfoTable.name: ospfAreaInfoTable
ospfAreaInfoTable.description: The table of OSPF Area information.

ospfAreaInfoIndex.name: ospfAreaInfoIndex
ospfAreaInfoIndex.description: The OSPF area number for which the OSPF info table is related.

ospfTotalNumberOfInterfaces.name: ospfTotalNumberOfInterfaces
ospfTotalNumberOfInterfaces.description: The total number of interfaces for this OSPF area.

ospfNumberOfInterfacesUp.name: ospfNumberOfInterfacesUp
ospfNumberOfInterfacesUp.description: The number of interfaces UP in area.

ospfNumberOfLsdbEntries.name: ospfNumberOfLsdbEntries
ospfNumberOfLsdbEntries.description: The number of Link State Database entries for this OSPF area.

ospfAreaInfoId.name: ospfAreaInfoId
ospfAreaInfoId.description: The IP address of the OSPF area.

ospfIntfInfoTable.name: ospfIntfInfoTable
ospfIntfInfoTable.description: The table of OSPF Interface information.

ospfIfInfoIndex.name: ospfIfInfoIndex
ospfIfInfoIndex.description: The OSPF interface number for which the OSPF info table is related.

ospfIfDesignatedRouterIP.name: ospfIfDesignatedRouterIP
ospfIfDesignatedRouterIP.description: The OSPF Designated Router ID (IP Address) for this OSPF interface.

ospfIfBackupDesignatedRouterIP.name: ospfIfBackupDesignatedRouterIP
ospfIfBackupDesignatedRouterIP.description: The OSPF Backup Designated Router ID (IP Address) for this OSPF interface.

ospfIfWaitInterval.name: ospfIfWaitInterval
ospfIfWaitInterval.description: The OSPF Wait interval for this OSPF interface.

ospfIfTotalNeighbours.name: ospfIfTotalNeighbours
ospfIfTotalNeighbours.description: The Total number of neighbours for this OSPF interface.

ospfIfInfoIpAddress.name: ospfIfInfoIpAddress
ospfIfInfoIpAddress.description: The IP address of the OSPF interface.

ospfRouterLSAInfoTable.name: ospfRouterLSAInfoTable
ospfRouterLSAInfoTable.description: The table of OSPF Router LSA information.

ospfRouterLSAInfoEntry.name: ospfRouterLSAInfoEntry
ospfRouterLSAInfoEntry.description: A row in the Router LSA Table indexed by area, routerlink and routerId.

routerLSAAreaIndex.name: routerLSAAreaIndex
routerLSAAreaIndex.description: The OSPF AreaID for which the OSPF Router LSA info table is related.

routerLSALinkIndex.name: routerLSALinkIndex
routerLSALinkIndex.description: The OSPF Link ID for which the OSPF Router LSA info table is related.

routerLSAId.name: routerLSAId
routerLSAId.description: The OSPF RouterID for which the OSPF Router LSA info table is related.

routerLSALinkID.name: routerLSALinkID
routerLSALinkID.description: Identifes the object that this router link connects to. Value depends on the link's type.

routerLSALinkData.name: routerLSALinkData
routerLSALinkData.description: This value depends on the link's Type field. For connections to stub networks, Link Data specifies the network's IP address mask. For unnumbered point-to-point connections, it specifies the interface's MIB-II ifIndex value and the value of Link Data is redundant. For the other link types it specifies the router interface's IP address.

routerLSALinkIfIndex.name: routerLSALinkIfIndex
routerLSALinkIfIndex.description: For unnumbered point-to-point connections, LinkIfIndex specifies the interface's MIB-II ifIndex value.

routerLSANoOfTOSMetrics.name: routerLSANoOfTOSMetrics
routerLSANoOfTOSMetrics.description: The number of different TOS metrics given for this link, not counting the required link metric(referred to as the TOS 0 metric).

routerLSANoOfTOSZeroMetrics.name: routerLSANoOfTOSZeroMetrics
routerLSANoOfTOSZeroMetrics.description: The number of Zero TOS metrics given for this link.

arpInfoEntry.name: arpInfoEntry
arpInfoEntry.description: A row in the ARP table

arpInfoDestIp.name: arpInfoDestIp
arpInfoDestIp.description: The destination IP address of the ARP entry.

arpInfoMacAddr.name: arpInfoMacAddr

vrrpInfoVirtRtrServer.description: The VRRP server state identifies virtual routers that support Layer 4 services.

vrrpInfoVirtRtrProxy.description: The VRRP proxy state identifies virtual proxy routers.

vrrpOperVirtRtrIndex.description: The index for the VRRP virtual router.

vrrpOperVirtRtrBackup.name: vrrpOperVirtRtrBackup
vrrpOperVirtRtrBackup.description: When set to a value of 'backup(2)' it forces the specified master virtual router into backup mode. 'ok(1)' is returned when the object os read.

vrrpOperVirtRtrGroupBackup.name: vrrpOperVirtRtrGroupBackup
vrrpOperVirtRtrGroupBackup.description: When set to a value of 'backup(2)' it forces the specified master virtual router group into backup mode. 'ok(1)' is returned when the object os read.
